thread.title: Want to use the public restroom? You must have a Troika card!
thread.title_full: Want to use the public restroom? You must have a Troika card!

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Want to use the public restroom? You must have a Troika card!
text:
Want to use the public restroom? You must have a Troika card!   
Sep 03, 2015 eTN   
The first free public toilet has been installed at Prospekt Mira metro station in central Moscow, the capitalâ€™s underground railway chief, Dmitry Pegov, said on Tuesday. 
Passengers will have access to the platform-level facility using the Troika card, an electronic ticket from the city's public transport operator. 
Funds will not be deducted from the card. 
Passengers had been urging Moscow transport to provide toilet facilities and called for underground stations to be equipped with rest rooms.
